title: Oral bacteria in pancreas linked to more aggressive tumors

title_detail.value: Oral bacteria in pancreas linked to more aggressive tumors

summary: The presence of oral bacteria in so-called cystic pancreatic tumours is associated with the severity of the tumour, researchers report. It is hoped that the results can help to improve diagnosis and treatment of pancreatic cancer.
